name: Gravity Dot
description:
Gravity Dot is a game where you can click on gravity orbs to make your character fly into that direction. Use this to swing yourself into the finish, get past obstacles and build up momentum to get through the red zones
Try to get the best time or a no death run if you want an extra challenge!

Help me out:
Please leave a comment, like or similar if you would like to see more of this.
(Feedback is also very much appreciated :3)
If you have any questions feel free to ask me on Discord. (Flowwave#1712)
